subject: Your new line of credit has been approved
body: Our records show you have been granted a large line of credit. See here           This email was sent by a third party on behalf of National Platinum Plus. National Platinum Plus does not have your email address. To stop receiving email regarding this ad only, visit this site or contact National Platinum Plus, Mail Center 2 Wisconsin Circle, Suite 700 Chevy Chase, MD 20815 Attn: Customer Care.
